description: The Stretch Knit Glove is a lightweight, knitted baselayer glove designed using a Thermolite® yarn, for year-round layering use.<br>Quick-drying and stretchy, the glove features a seamless-knit construction which improves comfort when worn as a layering piece, or makes a smart and comfy stand alone glove, perfect for when you're nipping out to pick up the latest winter guide book from your local gear shop!
name: Stretch Knit Gloves
